content: this drawstring bag can be used to keep your wips safe or for any other purpose the pattern features 3 sizes different methods to create a drawstring and instructions to sew in a lining optional to keep small items from falling out sizes 1 2 3 finished measurements 20 x 20 25 x 25 30 x 30 cm gauge 19 5 st x 28 row per 10 cm needles 3 75 mm circular needles 40 cm for size 1 and 2 60 cm for size 3 yarn used drops bomull-lin grams of yarn needed 100 100 150 g
